## Non-Functional Requirements
### NFR-001: Performance
- API Response Time: < 200ms (p95)
- Page Load Time: < 2 seconds
- Concurrent Users: 1,000+

### NFR-002: Security
- Authentication: OAuth2/JWT
- Data Encryption: At-rest and in-transit
- Compliance: GDPR, HIPAA (if applicable)
